name: speed boy vs disc robot
description:
follow me on  twitter : https://twitter.com/GamedevYoung

this is two player game made for discroom game jam

the first player plays as fast superhero boy with the arrows 

and the second plays as a robot with the mouse

the robot has to build some towers that shoot discs to kill the boy

and the boy has to dodge them 

the robot can get money by killing birds or by hurting the boy

if the robot manages to kill the boy before the screens bocome red he will win ,else the boy will win , see the video for more details ...

(if the game lags in brawser you can download it on pc )
